home.message: Entity dedicated body and soul to rhythmic gymnastics. Our goal is to make gymnasts of all ages and levels happy and train them, as well as to create gymnastics that is more than a sport, it is art in movement!

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description:
Get in touch with us and we’ll be happy to help you with any questions about our classes, competitions, or registrations.
You can also call us or send us an email — we’ll reply as soon as possible.
contact.address: Carrer de l'Àncora, 31, 08800 Vilanova i la Geltrú, Barcelona
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.sent_message: Your message has been sent successfully. You will receive a response shortly.

form_registration.name: Name
form_registration.has_illness: Any illness, surgery, injury, allergy, etc.? Which one?
form_registration.email_message: Please enter the email address where you wish to receive the information. If the gymnast is of legal age, it can be their own.
form_registration.tel_message: Enter the main contact phone number. If the gymnast is of legal age, it can be their own.
form_registration.image_rights_explanation: Since the right to one's own image is recognized in Article 18.1 of the Constitution and regulated by Law 5/1982 of May 5th, on the right to honor, personal and family privacy, and one's own image; the Club's management requests consent from the parents or legal guardians to publish photographs where their children appear and can be clearly identified.
form_registration.authorize: Yes, I authorize my child’s image to appear in photographs related to complementary and extracurricular activities organized by Club Gimnàstic Ballerina.
form_registration.no_authorize: No, I do not authorize my child’s image to appear in photographs related to complementary and extracurricular activities organized by Club Gimnàstic Ballerina.
form_registration.confirmation_message: The processing of this data follows the established regulations (Organic Law 15/1999 of December 13th. Protection of Personal Data). This authorization is valid from the date of signing this form and will remain valid for all seasons in which the gymnast is a member of the Club.
form_registration.added_message: You will receive a confirmation email to access your personal portal

try-it.name: Name and surname
try-it.done_rhythmic: Has she ever done rhythmic gymnastics?
try-it.message: Would you like to add a message?
try-it.sent_message: Once the technical team receives this information, you’ll get a reply to arrange the trial day. Thank you very much, we hope to see you soon!
